reference.shortdesc: Each choice element describes one way that the user could perform the current step.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The choice element is specialized from li. It is defined in the task module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how a user can be presented with a set of choices for how to select a server:
example.codeblock: <step><cmd>Choose a server.</cmd> <choices> <choice>If you have a remote server you want to test on, type the IP address or hostname of the server.</choice> <choice>If you want to do local testing, type <userinput>localhost</userinput>.</choice> </choices> </step>
